LanguageData.Denture.label: denture
LanguageData.Denture.description: An installed denture. Allows for some basic functionality like eating and talking.
LanguageData.PegLeg.label: peg leg
LanguageData.PegLeg.description: An installed peg leg. Allows the user to walk again, albeit not very well.
LanguageData.WoodenFoot.label: wooden foot
LanguageData.WoodenFoot.description: An installed wooden foot. Restores some stability to the user, but without finer motor skills.
LanguageData.WoodenHand.label: wooden hand
LanguageData.WoodenHand.description: An installed wooden hand. Better than a stump, but not by much.
